1.notes: Students are permitted to move elective credits between years. Students who take courses in MATH_V with extra credits will require fewer elective credits in later years. Elective credits together with required courses must fulfill the Faculty of Science’s: a) Foundational Requirement ; b) Laboratory Science Requirement ; c) Science Breadth Requirement ; d) Science and Arts Requirements ; e) Upper-level Requirement ; f) General Degree Requirements .
For a full list of acceptable courses see Communication Requirement .

3.code: Any Upper level MATH , STAT , CPSC or DSCI
3.notes: At least 6 credits must be 400-level or higher.
Students must choose from a list of courses. See the Data Science website for more detail.
